name: AMALGAMATIONS OF THE ABYSS
description:
Fight against 3 unique powerful bullet-hell bosses in a beautiful neon environment as a lost soul trying to free itself from the depths of the abyss, a dark endless void filled with godlike entities...

[THE BOSSES]

-The perforated priest: a powerful mage roaming the depths of the abyss to consume lost souls (such as yourself) for more power...

-Murena, Mother Voidleech: An ancient worm-like being with an endless hunger constantly seeking even the smallest source of energy in the abyss... before promptly devouring it...

-Malus, The Spectre Of Calamity: an omnipresent formless being that exists only to stop lost souls from escaping the depths of the abyss...

[CONTROLS]

-WASD movement

-MOUSE0/LEFT CLICK to shoot

-SHIFT to slow down for more precise movement and shooting

-R to restart a level

-ESC to go back to main menu
